Replying to 
@BlockExtreme
 and 
@lopp
If your node generate blocks, you are participating in the game.

If your node doesn't generate blocks, you are a spectator. There is nothing wrong with being a spectator.

Most of us will be spectators. Bitcoin is not like orienteering.
